Articles.Content:
Gets nitrogen ice,

inserts dry ice...

Gets wet ice.

Inserts liquid hydrogen

Gets liquid oxygen 

Inserts liquid oxygen

Gets an explosion from the reaction with the liquid hydrogen.

Inserts juice from space

gets a rainbow

inserts A THING

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-05T16:42:02Z" title="12/05/2015 04:42  PM" data-short="8 yr">December 5, 2015</time> by ThatGuyWithALongUsername**

gets A THING

inserts Mr. bulldops

Get ms. bulldops

Insert conspiracy

Gets Illuminati

Inserts a Kuzzter

Gets the universe

Inserts hand

Gets 5 "Chips" and suspiciously smelling "Tomato" sauce.

Inserts the vending machine.

Gets singularity.

Inserts the Sun.

Gets device that goes "ding".

Inserts lithium polymer battery shaped like a ferret.

Gets ferret shaped like a lithium polymer battery.

Inserts different vending machine.

Gets a vending machine vending vending machines that vend if vending machine inserted into aforementioned vending machine.

Inserts $50 billion, a house with a garage filled with sports cars, a life, and a family. Hopes to get something cool.

Gets a chunk of snow (hey, you asked for something cool, and dry ice is downright *cold*).

Inserts a bottle of soda

Gets a bottle'o'jam.

Inserts daughter.

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, cubinator said:
> 
> 
> Gets a chunk of snow (hey, you asked for something cool, and dry ice is downright *cold*).
> 

That's *rad*, bro! Totally worth it!

Gets a small loan of a million dollars. 

Inserts *puns*.

Gets punette square

Inserts Gregor Mendell

Gets a massive array of pea plants.

Inserts Stephen Hawking.

Gets plethora of scientific things all named 'Hawking \_\_\_\_'

Insets regular boring Sonic

Gets a LASERSPACESONIC.

Inserts Waffle.

Gets pancake.

Inserts CKAN.exe

Gets a ton of mods, unfortunately your pc melts down.

Inserts JOHN CENA. [Insert Overused Theme Here]

Gets JOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHN CEEEEEEEEEEEENAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Inserts shard of glass.

Machine sees the glass is tainted and won't sell, doesn't give you anything...

Inserts Matuchkin.
